multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: rates, FX, equities, and safe‑haven gold; heightened Ukraine war risk premium pushes US Treasury yields up 10‑20bp, lifts the dollar index by ~0.5‑1%, depresses the S&P 500, and boosts gold by 5‑10%.
